list.name: Han Solo
list.description: Pilot of the Millenium Falcon. Gave the party a strange communication device that appears to have localized tracking

list.name: Second Sister
list.description: Appears human, but horribly disfigured. Sevastor has an unexplained fear of her

list.name: Runa Tiille
list.description: Rescued from an Imperial outpost on Bogano. Not much else is known about her

list.name: Greg
list.description: Commander of the first Greg detachment of the Greg squadron of the Greg battalion

list.name: Orar Janraw
list.description: Former Black Sun, now runs an illegal club on Ord Mantell. Wants to resurrect the Black Suns to their former glory
